message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal and you'll be very happy with it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I'm not sure I can justify paying $95.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle? I can do $85 for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
